## Correlation {.small}

$$
\tiny
f(\mathbf{x}) = \frac{1}{\sqrt{(2 \pi)^k \det \left( \begin{bmatrix} 
\sigma_1^2 & \rho_{12} \sigma_1 \sigma_2 & \cdots & \rho_{1k} \sigma_1 \sigma_k \\ 
\rho_{21} \sigma_2 \sigma_1 & \sigma_2^2 & \cdots & \rho_{2k} \sigma_2 \sigma_k \\ 
\vdots & \vdots & \ddots & \vdots \\ 
\rho_{k1} \sigma_k \sigma_1 & \rho_{k2} \sigma_k \sigma_2 & \cdots & \sigma_k^2 
\end{bmatrix} \right)}} 
\exp \left( -\frac{1}{2} (\mathbf{x} - \boldsymbol{\mu})^T \left( \begin{bmatrix} 
\sigma_1^2 & \rho_{12} \sigma_1 \sigma_2 & \cdots & \rho_{1k} \sigma_1 \sigma_k \\ 
\rho_{21} \sigma_2 \sigma_1 & \sigma_2^2 & \cdots & \rho_{2k} \sigma_2 \sigma_k \\ 
\vdots & \vdots & \ddots & \vdots \\ 
\rho_{k1} \sigma_k \sigma_1 & \rho_{k2} \sigma_k \sigma_2 & \cdots & \sigma_k^2 
\end{bmatrix} \right)^{-1} (\mathbf{x} - \boldsymbol{\mu}) \right)$$
